nodes.text: Ayelixe Fabrico was a company that manufactured textiles and clothing. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a transport carrying Ayelixe textiles exploded in the atmosphere over the planet Rhinnal. Ayelixe eventually merged with Krongbing Interstellar Fashions, a larger but struggling clothing corporation, to form Ayelixe/Krongbing Textiles.
